sentence.Network_en: He was unwashed , uncombed, with his clothes half buttoned.

sentence.Network_en: My mother said that I could not leave the house with uncombed hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 我妈妈说我不能头发乱蓬蓬的就出门.

sentence.Network_en: I kept wondering if I was uncombed or unzipped.
sentence.Network_cn: 我总怀疑自己是不是没梳头或没系好拉锁.
